text: I thought this was an interesting museum, albeit relatively small.  Some of the exhibits were very unusual, but some were very interesting.  It took less than 1 hour to see everything.
Have been here twice in the past two years, the shows were kinda amazing, especially the Biennale show in 2014.

I always visit art and history museums wherever I go.  this was a short visit, nothing stands out in my memory but it is always worth it to enjoy the beauty of  art!  (Visited July 2007 but TripAdvisor dates does not go back that far!)
This building is worth visiting for the history of Korea and for its own architecture. No tickets and a good view of Seoul Tower.
